Title: Smoke Before Fire
Description:
Sully scouted the Horde establishment to the north, and he reports seeing a large pile of explosives, along with a small force of demolishers. That's not to mention the demons that their warlocks have summoned.

Luckily, we came prepared. We've got air support from the Skyfire. We just need to show our pilots where to strike.

<Rell hands you a smoke flare, and gives you a knowing nod.>
ObjectivesText: Use the Alliance Flare to call in an airstrike on the Pile of Munitions, the Twinspire Demolishers, the Wild Imps, and Xhu'daggab.
CompletionText:
What's that you've got, $glad:lass;? Some kind o' flare?

Shoot, I coulda put together a better flare'n that in half a wink, if Rell had only asked.
RewardText: Me lads up in the sky bring the heat, don't they? Ha ha ha!
